name: Herald (Desktop Pet)
description:
Cute Lil Duck called Herald that Sits on you Taskbar! Move around with A and D. Make Him Sit Down with S or get Up With W. If your Done Positioning him Click anywhere and he will Stop Moving until you Click him!

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Please Remember that this is a Prototype, and more Updates are Coming Sooner or Later.

--------------------------- Instructions -------------------------

1.  Extract The Folder

2. Run Duckie.exe

3. Enjoy your new Friend!

Currently If you Want to Remove Duckie You Have to Do that by Clicking on him and Pressing Alt f4. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Please Post all Bugs in the Report Bugs topic.
